name: The Ophelia Console - Davidson
description: An uber sleek console, the Ophelia boasts clean lines and perfect proportion, this good-looking console will elevate any room and transform it into a space of style and sophistication. The table top comes in a range of sizes standing a wide arc combined with an angular base in a dark finish to accentuate its form and draw the eye. Also available in any of Davidson's high gloss and satin timbers and lacquers, there are variety of pale shades to choose from that give a light airiness to a room. There is the option to inject extra charm to the Ophelia with a hand gilded inner pedestal in shimmering shades of luxurious white gold leaf, moon gold leaf or yellow gold leaf.
